content:
Congratulations on your win! Completing six out of eight destination tickets is a great achievement, and I'm sure it was a thrilling game. Sneaking in a lucky move at the end can be so satisfying, especially when it pays off.

It's great that you have a gaming buddy like Mike to play with regularly. Playing with the same people can really help you develop your strategies and tactics, and it's always more fun to play with someone who knows the game well.

Elfenland and Trains are both excellent choices, and I think you'll enjoy them. Elfenland has a similar feel to Ticket to Ride, but with some unique twists, and Trains offers a fresh take on the train-themed gameplay. Let me know what you think of them once you've had a chance to play!

By the way, have you and Mike considered trying any of the Ticket to Ride expansions? There are some great ones out there that can add new challenges and gameplay elements to the base game. For example, the "Europe" expansion introduces new train cars and routes, while the "Märklin" expansion adds a new game mechanic with passengers.

Keep gaming, and I hope you have many more thrilling victories!
